titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 95: Part of the ʹArukh by Natan ben Jeḥiʾel of Rome

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

availability.licence: These images and the content of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 95: Part of the ʹArukh by Natan ben Jeḥiʾel of Rome are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Headwords marked with superlinear decoration, and placed between 2 spaces; one vocalized word; Contains definitions of words אוב (starting with ידיו וידעוני, parallel to, in the published edition of Kohut: ʹArukh ha-shalem / Alexander Kohut [ed.]. Vienna, 1878-1892, vol. 1. p. 3 column I l. 30); אובא טמיא; אבא; אבוב ; אביב; אב בית; אבוב רואה; אבד; אב דומה; אב דן; אבזקת; אבזר; אבט; אבטליא; אבטינס; אביי (to טעמא מקצת, ibid. p. 6 column II l. 15), including the comments cited in the name of R. Hananel on Talmud Berakhot 59a, and the beginning of the condensed version of the Responsum of Sherirah Gaon on the titles of the Amoraim.
Condition: consecutive, losses from center interior edge of fol. 1 (Halper 95), mostly detached from fol. 2 (Halper 96) except at foot; line lacking from lower exterior corner of fol. 2 (r? v?).

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

msContents.textLang: Hebrew; Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE)

msItem.title: Part of the ʹArukh by Natan ben Jeḥiʾel of Rome
msItem.author: Nathan ben Jehiel, 1035-ca. 1110.

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 23; ruling method: lines "poorly ruled"; left rule unjustified.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).

keywords.term: Hebrew language, Talmudic , Dictionaries Early works to 1800
